pr_title: GEODE-7845: Now behaving with clients of various versions.

timeline.message: GEODE-7845: Now behaving with clients of various versions.

timeline.bodyText: Change all the ServerOperationException  to be UnsupportedOperationException in this class, including comments and method names.
timeline.author: gesterzhou

timeline.bodyText: it's better to have one test to run pr clear from an old version and another test to run pr clear from a new version. Two test methods.
timeline.author: gesterzhou

replies.bodyText: Not sure I follow here, I have it broken out into two different client side tests. client -> old server, client -> new server
replies.author: mhansonp

replies.bodyText:
I think Gester is recommending expanding the testing to include:

new client --> new server
new client --> old server
old client --> new server
old client --> old server

If (3) and (4) throw UnsupportedOperationException without sending any message to the server, then they could probably be collapsed into a single test.
replies.author: kirklund

timeline.bodyText:
This message reads weird. Maybe change to:
"Server(s) " + memberNames + " are running a version older than (<" + KnownVersion.GEODE_1_14_0 + ">) which does not support partitioned region clear.");
timeline.author: kirklund
